data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Sikasso access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sikasso, Mali

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Sikasso, Mali.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Sikasso who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Sikasso, Mali know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Duun, Samogo people. Make the Duun, Samogo people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 2,625,900 people living in the state of Sikasso.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Sikasso, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sikasso to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
